metadata.description: For over 400 years, the name "Sinbad" has conjured images of danger, intrigue and adventure.  Now, Storm is proud to present a new chapter about the intrepid sailor.  Join Sinbad and his crew as they journey to the dangerous Island of the Rex'i'cor to track down a powerful diamond in the hands of the mysterious Merchant of Ages.
metadata.name: Sinbad and the Merchant of Ages
